data.title: Dance Complex Series Events
data.text:
The Dance Complex Series Events

In response to the needs expressed by community members during the pandemic, The Dance Complex created opportunities for movers and makers of all kinds in the 2021-2022 season. As the 2024-2025 season approaches, we will continue to offer our DIY Performance, Learning to Walk the Talk, and Reflection, Healing, and Movement series. New for the 2024-2025 season, Friday Night Lights joins our DC Event Series.

Like previous years, we’re offering the opportunity for you, our community, to help us by…

Nominating topics and facilitators for our discussion series “Learning to Walk the Talk”

Suggesting types of sessions and teachers/facilitators for our wellness series “Reflection, Healing & Movement”

Applying for dates on the calendar for your work to be performed at The DC in our “DIY Performance Series”

APPLICATIONS FOR THE 2024-2025 SEASON ARE NOW OPEN.

DIY PERFORMANCE SERIES

Opportunity for Performance Makers

The DC will collaborate with artists to bring their work to our spaces. We will provide the artist with space and a box office split of 80/20 per cent in favor of the artist. There are 20+ weekends available in one of our two performance spaces – Julie Ince Thompson Theatre (Studio 1) and Studio 7. It is recommended that the artist have self produced previously and have other funding in place to cover artistic expenses. We encourage a wide spectrum of genres and cultural origins within under-represented communities.

DIY Performance Resources:

*These references are intended to give prospective participants a reference on cost and procedures. Procedures for the upcoming season are subject to change*
